title: David Sedaris: Live at Carnegie Hall/Live for Your Listening Pleasure
description: If you are driving, pull over. If you are at work, close your doorâ€”unless you don't mind your colleagues seeing you doubled over, in tears, on your office floor. With these two CDs, taped before delirious sold-out audiences, you are there as David Sedaris performs his hilarious stories. This set will appeal to Sedaris' loyal fans as well as admirers of classic comedy albums.
author: David Sedaris
